about

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”3″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”55″ position_horizontal=”right” gutter_size=”3″ back_image=”62383″ back_repeat=”no-repeat” back_position=”center center” overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” shift_x=”5″ shift_y=”5″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” width=”2/6″ back_size=”cover” el_class=”scroll-slow img-down”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”75″ position_horizontal=”right” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”-1″ shift_y=”-5″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”100″ width=”4/6″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h4″ text_size=”fontsize-145926″ text_space=”fontspace-135905″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”accent” css_animation=”bottom-t-top”]What We’re About[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″]Transforming the way clients find talent and candidates find work. [/vc_custom_heading][uncode_list icon=”fa fa-check” icon_color=”accent” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”400″]

  • We provide clients with flexible and fixed solutions to deliver the right high-end candidate for their hiring needs.
  • We support the freelance and contract workforce by expanding the reach of available short-term projects. We also provide stability and security by placing candidates with the full-time positions they’ve been searching for.
  • We ignite the passion of our employees, provide them with the tools they need to succeed, and create internal job growth opportunities through communication and collaboration.

[/uncode_list][vc_empty_space Our Core Values

[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-124028″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”1/3″][vc_icon display=”inline” icon_image=”58899″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”100″][/vc_icon][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_color=”accent” sub_reduced=”yes”]Mentality[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h4″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-gyho”]

Tenacious. Fearless. Resilient.
Our mentality is what drives us forward. Better than yesterday. Always. Together, we’re unstoppable.

[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-124028″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”400″ width=”1/3″][vc_icon display=”inline” icon_image=”58900″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″][/vc_icon][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_color=”accent” sub_reduced=”yes”]Accountability[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h4″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-gyho”]Delivering best-in-class products, services, and solutions is our only option. Mediocrity doesn’t exist because holding ourselves to the highest standards fuels our growth. [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”2″ back_color=”color-124028″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”600″ width=”1/3″][vc_icon display=”inline” icon_image=”58927″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”300″][/vc_icon][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h1″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_color=”accent” sub_reduced=”yes”]Process[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h4″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-gyho”]Staffing is an art form. Using the left and right brain, we have developed a process with a fulfillment ratio of 67%. (*cough cough* Industry standard is only 28%.) [/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_visibility=”yes” medium_width=”0″ mobile_visibility=”yes” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/4″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_center” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”3″ width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” heading_semantic=”h5″ text_size=”h5″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-gyho” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”100″]

But only together can we succeed

history

[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”90″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”-5″ shift_y=”5″ z_index=”0″ width=”3/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1480710687231{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h4″ text_space=”fontspace-210350″ text_font=”font-921308″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”color-prif” sub_reduced=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”100″]Our Expertise[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h4″ text_height=”fontheight-357766″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-prif” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_delay=”200″]Founded in 2000, Mondo is the largest national staffing agency specializing exclusively in high-end, niche Tech, IT, and Digital Marketing talent. With an emphasis on emerging technologies, we were one of the first staffing agencies to recognize the growing demand for talent with both creative and technically-minded skill sets. In response, we began building an exclusive tech-driven network of professionals nearly two decades ago that has grown to over 1.4 million of the most qualified IT consultants, Tech experts, and Digital Marketing talent.

 

Our passion for driving business growth through Tech-based talent solutions has led to unparalleled success.[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″
